li.t-if: company.email and company.fax or company.email and company.phone

t.t-if: not o or not 'company_id' in o

table.t-attf-style: margin:0; font-family: Arial,Helvetica, sans-serif; background:#fff; line-height:20px; border-bottom: 1px solid #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'};

table.style: font-size:12px;padding:0px 20px 20px 20px; margin:0; font-family: Arial,Helvetica, sans-serif; background:#fff; line-height:20px;
color:#000000; text-transform:capitalize; font-size:14px; border: 1px solid #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'};

td.t-attf-style: border-bottom:1px solid #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'}; padding:0px;

table.style: font-size:14px;border:0.5px solid #ccc; border-collapse: collapse; text-transform:capitalize; padding:15px;border-bottom:1px solid #ccc;

tr.t-attf-style: page-break-inside: avoid !important;padding:5px 10px; border:0.5px solid #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'}; font-weight:bold; background-color: #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'}; color: #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_text_color or '#000000'};

td.t-attf-style: padding:5px 10px; color: #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_text_color or '#000000'}; border:1px solid #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'} !important; border-right:0px solid #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'} !important; font-weight:bold;

padding:5px 10px; color: #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_text_color or '#000000'}; border:1px solid #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'} !important; border-right:0px solid #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'} !important; font-weight:bold;

padding:5px 10px; color: #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_text_color or '#000000'}; border:1px solid #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'} !important; border-right:0px solid #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'} !important; font-weight:bold;

padding:5px 10px; color: #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_text_color or '#000000'}; border:1px solid #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'} !important; border-right:0px solid #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'} !important; font-weight:bold;

padding:5px 10px; color: #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_text_color or '#000000'}; border:1px solid #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'} !important; border-right:0px solid #{o.company_id and o.company_id.theme_color or '#000000'} !important; font-weight:bold;

td.style: font-size:13px; color: #{o.company_id and o.company_id.text_color or '#000000'}; padding-top:10px;

t.t-value: o.report_template_id and o.report_template_id.report_name or o.partner_id and o.partner_id.report_po_template_id and o.partner_id.report_po_template_id.report_name or o.company_id and o.company_id.report_po_template_id and o.company_id.report_po_template_id.report_name

t.t-if: o.report_template_id or o.partner_id and o.partner_id.report_po_template_id or o.company_id and o.company_id.report_po_template_id
